__data__.text: This is Police Agent at 2025年02月13日（星期四）09:30 Plan：Wake up at 5；Patrol along preset routes through Chinatown streets at 6:30；Monitor and guide the crowd at 7:30；Support congested areas when necessary at 8:00；Take a short break and hydrate at 9:30；Continue patrol and monitor crowd density at 10:00；Review security updates and communication check at 11:00；Have breakfast at 12:00；Take a short rest and prepare for afternoon duties at 13:00；Continue crowd monitoring and guidance at 14:00；Conduct safety check and equipment inspection at 15:30；Have lunch at 16:00；Review incident reports and adjust patrol strategy at 17:00；Continue patrol and support congested areas at 18:00；Take a break and rest at 19:00；Watch TV at 20:00；Prepare for tomorrow's duty and review plans at 21:00；Sleep at 22:30
